Text: FW Seminar InvitationA friend is giving a seminar next week if anyone is interested in going With the uncertainty in financial markets and changes taking place in everything from the way we do business to how we think about our lives this seminar will address how to plan our financial futures from where to invest now to planning techniques in investments and estate planning Having navigated client investments through previous wars and shocks to the economy I will discuss the state of the economy and asset allocation techniques for your investments in this precarious time Other topics discussed retirement planning under the new tax act and determining your risk tolerance I look forward to seeing you at this informative seminar Feel free to bring interested parties regards Laurie A McRay CPA RIA McRay Money Management LLC Teetshorn St Houston Texas email wwwmcraymoneycom o cell Inspiring your investment path seminarinvitationdoc
